originalText.text: I highly recommend going to this store it has top best breakfast , smoothies, salad , and best variety of food. The service is great they are friendly and helpful and one of the cleanest store ive been in.

text.text: I highly recommend going to this store it has top best breakfast , smoothies, salad , and best variety of food. The service is great they are friendly and helpful and one of the cleanest store ive been in.

originalText.text: I get a variety of different things. But usually, for me, it's always the same. Want I don't like it when getting those same items daily, The price changes via throughout the day or daily. I will cut back on going to this store. I totally understand prices going up and changing due to the economy, but this throughout the day or daily thing or weekly no. Not having it. Like you guys, but taking a break.

originalText.text: I love going here, never seem to disappoint. Food, Service, Best Coffee, Fair Prices, Can be busy at times but I prefer quality over rushed food. Also their selection of products are amazing.

text.text: I love going here, never seem to disappoint. Food, Service, Best Coffee, Fair Prices, Can be busy at times but I prefer quality over rushed food. Also their selection of products are amazing.

originalText.text:
Healthy choice was an addition to the neighborhood . The best salad bar i seen in NYC so many option fresh all times , the juice and smoothies amazing and they still sell it for the same since they open 6 years ago .
And they always active with east harlem community
I love it there

originalText.text:
I work in the area and always get my Smoothie from here and sometimes lunch. I call ahead of time for my order. Very friendly staff and my order is always ready on time! Thank you!--- written 6 months ago and gave them a 5 star rating.

Current review--

I work in the area and sometimes even  after a few disappointments from here. I get a cold turkey sandwich and a smoothie from here for lunch. I ignored it the first few times, but this was the last time I was going to get this repeated service.

I am now changing my 5 star rating to now a 1. The bread roll is hard and dry, very difficult to bite into. The cheddar cheese is dry on the edges and some towards the inside. I asked for extra mayo and barely any mayo. The lettuce is old and color changed.
The person I gave the order too, told me they serve medium size smoothies, but I got a small smoothie. If you don't have it , then just say we don't have it. Do not charge me for something and give me something else.

When I called the shop back because I was very upset, the the person who answered the phone said "what can I do for you then?".. rude.. I told them I was not going to be coming back to get another sandwich but this is not the way to do service. He said "ok the next time you come.." I cut him off and told him I was not going to return again because of repeated disappointments. He said "ok".. as if he didn't care....  Very disappointing. Bad customer service.

I will not be coming back to this location. Thank you for the treatment.
